name: Invasion of the Claxions
description:
Invasion of the Claxions is inspired by Namco's

Galaga.

RED ALERT!! A CLAXION FLEET IS PREPARING TO INVADE OUR PLANET!!

It's all up to you, cadet!! The Claxion fleet is preparing to attack our planet. It is your duty to put an end to the fleet and save our planet from destruction. Now, get out there and make your admiral proud!!
